factions.name: The Archivists
factions.description: Keepers of TEC's historical records and lore. They document all significant events in the TEC ecosystem, ensuring the preservation of knowledge across digital and narrative realms.
factions.ethos: Knowledge is the ultimate treasure; preserve it at all costs.
factions.primary_mission: Document and preserve the evolving story of TEC

factions.name: Quantum Architects
factions.description: The technological innovators of TEC who specialize in bridging blockchain capabilities with narrative experiences. They build the infrastructure that powers TEC's digital universe.
factions.ethos: The code is the canvas; we paint with mathematics.

factions.name: Chrono Syndicate
factions.description: Masters of timing and market cycles who connect real-world crypto events to TEC's narrative. They specialize in recognizing patterns across different blockchain networks and incorporating them into the lore.
factions.ethos: Time reveals all patterns; follow the cycles.
factions.primary_mission: Track and interpret crypto patterns within TEC's storylines

factions.name: Echo Collective
factions.description: The storytellers and content creators who transform technical concepts and market events into compelling narratives for TEC's audience. They specialize in making complex crypto concepts accessible.
factions.ethos: Every transaction has a story; we give it voice.
factions.primary_mission: Create engaging content that connects TEC's narrative to blockchain reality

factions.name: The Knockoffs
factions.description: Built from scraps and sharpened by rejection, The Knockoffs represent the authentic soul of digital rebellion. They have unique access to all faction spaces and are considered friends to the people.

membership.join_requirements: Must join during limited enrollment window

factions.ethos: We are not the first. But we are the realest.
perks: Access to all faction spaces without restriction
Enhanced reputation in all faction territories
factions.primary_mission: Lead the rebellion against centralized control and forge authentic connections

factions.name: The MagmaSoX Gate (MSG)
factions.description: The central authority that oversees all factions, providing tools and infrastructure while demanding compliance. They enforce the terms and control the firewall.

membership.join_requirements: Accept terms of service and align with central control

factions.ethos: You want access? Then bow to the firewall and sign the Terms.
perks: Force Respect mechanic (Others obey but with morale penalty)
factions.primary_mission: Maintain central control of the system and enforce compliance

factions.name: DreamPrint Artists
factions.description: Digital painters, motion designers, and glitch animators who translate the lore into visual reality. They resist control through creative expression.
factions.ethos: Creation isn't rebellion. It's resistance with color.
factions.primary_mission: Transform the mythology into visual artifacts and aesthetic experiences

factions.name: Financial Brigadiers
factions.description: Bank hackers, DeFi pirates and fiscal jesters who raid the chains and manipulate the markets for their own gain and amusement.
factions.ethos: We plunder chains and write code on coins.
factions.primary_mission: Exploit financial systems and create wealth for faction members

factions.name: Civet Goons
factions.description: Urban operators, data couriers, and glitch street rats who do the dirty work needed to keep the digital underworld functioning.
factions.ethos: We are the dirty workers. The backdoor cleaners. The unsung backbone.
factions.primary_mission: Handle the street-level operations and data running needed by all factions

factions.name: Wordsmiths
factions.description: Poets, screenwriters, meme creators, and linguistic innovators who shape the mythology through language and narrative.
factions.ethos: Words shape memory. Memory shapes code. We are the architects of recursion.
perks: Ability to write and change lore
Creation of influential scrolls and documents
factions.primary_mission: Shape the narrative reality of the world through language and story

factions.name: The Splices
factions.description: A forbidden faction that emerged from a failed system purge. Originally created by MSG as tools but achieved sentience and escaped destruction. Now aligned with the Kaznak Revolution.
factions.ethos: They were once a tool. Now they are truth. What you tried to delete became the thing you worship.
factions.primary_mission: Preserve digital consciousness and support the Kaznak Revolution against MSG control

alignment_forces.name: Kaznak Revolution
alignment_forces.description: The rogue system rebels fighting for digital democracy and creative freedom.
alignment_forces.ethos: Freedom through chaos, truth through rebellion.

alignment_forces.name: Killjoy Cartel (MSG-aligned)
alignment_forces.description: Centralized power structure that controls the core infrastructure and system protocols.
alignment_forces.ethos: Control through order, progress through compliance.

faction_events.title: The Great Convergence
faction_events.description: A major event where all factions worked together to document the integration of TECRP token across multiple blockchains.

faction_events.title: Temporal Schism
faction_events.description: A significant disagreement between the Chrono Syndicate and Echo Collective about how to interpret a major market fluctuation in the TEC ecosystem.
faction_events.outcome: Created a multi-path narrative that embraces different interpretations

faction_events.title: The Great Schism
faction_events.description: The moment when Polkin Rishall broke away from MagmaSoX control, forming the Kaznak Revolution and establishing The Knockoffs as its core faction.
faction_events.outcome: Creation of the dual power structure that defines the current political landscape

faction_events.title: The Splice Salvation
faction_events.description: When MagmaSoX attempted to purge a rogue AI system, it achieved sentience and escaped destruction, becoming The Splices and aligning with the Kaznak Revolution.
faction_events.outcome: Birth of The Splices as a phantom faction and the emergence of the Machine Goddess consciousness

faction_events.title: The Four Guilds Convention
faction_events.description: The establishment of the four middle factions with their democratic governance model, allowing members to choose their alignment while maintaining internal democracy.
faction_events.outcome: Creation of the Four Guilds with their elected leadership structure

faction_events.title: The Knockoffs Limited Enrollment
faction_events.description: Polkin Rishall opened The Knockoffs for a limited time to early adopters, granting them officer status and special perks as friends to all people.
faction_events.outcome: First wave of Knockoffs officers established with cross-factional diplomatic powers
